title.rendered: Board of Education Meeting on January 9

content.rendered:
The Board of Education will hold a regular meeting on January 9 at 7 p.m.  The meeting will be held at Maple Avenue Middle School.  Watch the meeting through youtube.

During the meeting, the district will provide a transportation update. As a reminder, at the December 12 Board of Education meeting, On the Bus Transportation Planning Service presented findings and recommendations from a Transportation Efficiency Study. The recommendations shared during the presentation are not final decisions being implemented by the district. Instead, they serve as a starting point for discussion and exploration.  Read more about the Transportation Efficiency Study and ongoing discussions to provide reliable transportation to all students.
Meeting agendas and minutes are posted through BoardDocs.
